These are the codes I dumped from my remote control of my Comfee A/C

*Head  A?  RevH RevA Speed C?  RevS RevC Temp Mode RevT RevM
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0000 1000 1111 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000000100011110111 //ON 17Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0001 1000 1110 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000001100011100111 //ON 18Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0011 1000 1100 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000011100011000111 //ON 19Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0010 1000 1101 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000010100011010111 //ON 20Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0110 1000 1001 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000110100010010111 //ON 21Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0111 1000 1000 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000111100010000111 //ON 22Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0101 1000 1010 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000101100010100111 //ON 23Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 0100 1000 1011 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000000100100010110111 //ON 24Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1100 1000 0011 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000001100100000110111 //ON 25Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1101 1000 0010 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000001101100000100111 //ON 26Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1001 1000 0110 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000001001100001100111 //ON 27Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1000 1000 0111 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000001000100001110111 //ON 28Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1010 1000 0101 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000001010100001010111 //ON 29Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1011 1000 0100 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000001011100001000111 //ON 30Deg Auto

*1011 0010 0100 1101 1011 1111 0100 0000 1100 0000 0011 1111* *101100100100110110111111010000001100000000111111 //ON 25Deg Cool
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1100 0100 0011 1011* *101100100100110100011111111000001100010000111011 //ON 25Deg Dry
*1011 0010 0100 1101 1011 1111 0100 0000 1100 1100 0011 0011* *101100100100110110111111010000001100110000110011 //ON 25Deg Heat

*1011 0010 0100 1101 1011 1111 0100 0000 1110 0100 0001 1011* *101100100100110110111111010000001110010000011011 //ON Fan (noSpeed)
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0011 1111 1100 0000 1110 0100 0001 1011* *101100100100110100111111110000001110010000011011 //ON Fan (High)
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0101 1111 1010 0000 1110 0100 0001 1011* *101100100100110101011111101000001110010000011011 //ON Fan (Med)
*1011 0010 0100 1101 1001 1111 0110 0000 1110 0100 0001 1011* *101100100100110110011111011000001110010000011011 //ON Fan (Low)

*1011 0101 0100 1010 1111 0101 0000 1010 1010 0010 0101 1101* *101101010100101011110101000010101010001001011101 //ON 25Deg Auto - TURBO
*1011 0101 0100 1010 1111 0101 0000 1010 1010 0010 0101 1101* *101101010100101011110101000010101010001001011101 //ON 27Deg Auto - TURBO
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0000 1111 1111 0000 1110 0000 0001 1111                    NOT REPEATED                    //ON 25Deg Auto - AirDirection
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0110 1011 1001 0100 1110 0000 0001 1111* *101100100100110101101011100101001110000000011111 //ON 25Deg Auto - Swing
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0110 1011 1001 0100 1110 0000 0001 1111* *101100100100110101101011100101001110000000011111 //ON 27Deg Auto - Swing

// Modes:
// Auto = 1000, Cool = 0000, Dry  = 0100, Heat = 1100, Fan  = 0100 (Temp always 1110)


// Temp:
// 17Deg = 0000, 18Deg = 0001, 19Deg = 0011, 20Deg = 0010, 21Deg = 0110, 22Deg = 0111, 23Deg = 0101
// 24Deg = 0100, 25Deg = 1100, 26Deg = 1101, 27Deg = 1001, 28Deg = 1000, 29Deg = 1010, 30Deg = 1011


// OFF is always the same. Examples:
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0111 1011 1000 0100 1110 0000 0001 1111**101100100100110101111011100001001110000000011111 //OFF 25Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0111 1011 1000 0100 1110 0000 0001 1111**101100100100110101111011100001001110000000011111 //OFF 26Deg Auto
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0111 1011 1000 0100 1110 0000 0001 1111**101100100100110101111011100001001110000000011111 //OFF 27Deg Auto

//Sleep OFF (Exactly the last setting: ON 25Deg Auto)
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0001 1111 1110 0000 1100 1000 0011 0111* *101100100100110100011111111000001100100000110111 

//Sleep ON (First part + Exactly the last setting, in my case "ON 25Deg Auto")
*1011 0010 0100 1101 1110 0000 0001 1111 0000 0011 1111 1100*101100100100110100011111111000001100100000110111*101100100100110100011111111000001100100000110111

//Swing doesn't seem to be affected by temperature
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0110 1011 1001 0100 1110 0000 0001 1111* *101100100100110101101011100101001110000000011111 //ON 25Deg Auto - Swing
*1011 0010 0100 1101 0110 1011 1001 0100 1110 0000 0001 1111* *101100100100110101101011100101001110000000011111 //ON 27Deg Auto - Swing

//Turbo doesn't seem to be affected by temperature
*1011 0101 0100 1010 1111 0101 0000 1010 1010 0010 0101 1101* *101101010100101011110101000010101010001001011101 //ON 25Deg Auto - TURBO
*1011 0101 0100 1010 1111 0101 0000 1010 1010 0010 0101 1101* *101101010100101011110101000010101010001001011101 //ON 27Deg Auto - TURBO
